name: Ocean Internet
tagline: pressing keys to make magic happen
body:
I'm a web developer with core skills in php & javascript...

... I like experimenting, trying things out, learning new things - this is a record of my adventures!

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
